name: Easy Language Switcher
author: Dreamwinner

sections.description:
This plugin lets you toggle between your native and development language.
It will help you to find the necessary line in the program code faster.
Useful when you develop a plugin or perform language debugging.
This plugin’s button may be found on admin’s dashboard and you can easy switch language anywhere, on any page.

Note

You can switch language only if:
1) you have your native language files .PO and .MO installed in your WordPress CMS
2) your native language available in your WordPress CMS and your browser can render it
sections.installation:
1. Upload easy-language-switcher folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload easy-language-switcher folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Switch between English development language and native user language.
